meanings.definition: A system of telephone dialing in which the caller presses buttons corresponding to numbers on the keypad to generate tones.
meanings.sent1: The touchtones on the phone help you make calls easily.
meanings.sent2: I used the touchtones to call my friend yesterday.
meanings.sent3: The touchtones on the phone seemed to sing a little tune as I dialed.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced on the touchtones, creating a melody of numbers.
meanings.sent5: The touchtones chimed softly as I entered the phone number.

meanings.definition: The buttons on a telephone keypad that produce tones when pressed.
meanings.sent1: I pressed the touchtones to call my mom.
meanings.sent2: The touchtones beeped as I dialed the number.
meanings.sent3: The touchtones on the phone looked like tiny musical buttons.
meanings.sent4: As I pressed the touchtones, they hummed a familiar sound.
meanings.sent5: The touchtones felt smooth under my fingertips as I dialed.
